name: Wheeling Thrust
help:
Delivers an attack to target.
Combo Action: Chaos Thrust
Combo Potency: 1,250
Combo Bonus: Strengthens the gaze on your Dragon Gauge by 1
Combo Bonus: Extends Blood of the Dragon or Life of the Dragon duration by 15s to a maximum of 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of either Blood of the Dragon or Life of the Dragon.

â€»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
